Name: Jigsaw Puzzle - Jack and the Beanstalk
About the game: If you like puzzles and a beautiful story, this is the right game for you, Jigsaw Puzzle Jack and the Beanstalk is a minimalist game with 5 difficulty levels (64, 144, 289, 484 and 784 pieces). 8 different puzzles with original art. Automatically saved parts so you never lose your progress. 5 difficulty levels (64, 144, 289, 484 and 784 pieces). With several backgrounds to change. Zoom and move the scene, highlight the edge pieces, mix the remaining pieces, visualize the scene. Relaxing music and atmosphere. Minimalist. Game Tips :) Move Piece Zoom Move Camera
